mapper.select:
select a.id, a.bandCount, a.balance, a.name, a.createTime, u1.username as createMan, a.updateTime, u2.username as updateMan, a.tip, a.isDel, a.belongBank from pharmacy.bank_account as a left join pharmacy.sys_user as u1 on a.createBy = u1.userId left join pharmacy.sys_user as u2 on a.updateBy = u2.userId where a.isDel = 0
and a.bandCount like CONCAT("%", #{bandCount}, "%")
and a.belongBank like CONCAT("%", #{belongBank}, "%")
and a.name like CONCAT("%", #{name}, "%")
select id, bandCount, balance, name, createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy, tip, isDel, belongBank from pharmacy.bank_account where isDel = 0 and bandCount = #{bandCount}
